resources.string: Hotword Plugin provides always-on wake word detection using minimal battery.
Automate will handle the action when your wake word is detected, launching Home Assistant Assist.
This will import the pre-configured flow that listens for wake words and opens Home Assistant Assist.
Open Automate and toggle on the \"HA Wake Word\" flow to activate it.
Import the \"Hey Mycroft\" wake word model into Hotword Plugin. After import, enable it in Hotword Plugin settings.

Your device is now ready. Say "Hey Mycroft" to open Home Assistant Assist.

Make sure:
• Hotword Plugin is running
• Automate flow is enabled
• Battery optimization is disabled for both apps
For reliable wake word detection, disable battery optimization for Hotword Plugin and Automate.
